abstract: Some pet owners will go to extreme lengths to preserve their pets long after they are dead, and Amy Finkel is working on a documentary of their efforts.
snippet: Some pet owners will go to extreme lengths to preserve their pets long after they are dead, and Amy Finkel is working on a documentary of their efforts.
lead_paragraph: Amy Finkel lives in an apartment in Boerum Hill, Brooklyn, that does not allow pets. But she does have a groundhog (Chompers), an armadillo (Fleischesser) and a boar (Angel). They are all, however, dead and stuffed - and in the case of the boar, it is just the head.

headline.main: Preserving Memories of Pets, and Then Some
